description:
Zero Tolerance: Redeployed - "Space Station Tour" Rough Demo

For those who've always wanted to play the classic Sega Mega Drive/Genesis FPS Zero Tolerance with modern controls and in glorious fullscreen...

This isn't quite what you're looking for.

However, if you're curious about an early proof-of-concept nostalgia hit, step right up...

In a similar vein to my other projects Aliens: Hunted and Ikari no Yousai: Fortified Zone 3D, Zero Tolerance: Redeployed is a fangame I started in Easy FPS Editor, but intend to finish off in Godot further down the line.

I've called this the ""Space Station Tour" Demo" because there isn't anything to do here besides move around recreations of the levels from Episode 1; sure, there are weapon pick-ups, but no enemies to fight. Other glaring omissions from this build include absolutely no sound effects, only one wall texture, an incomplete roster of said weapons, and no exit on the final floor.

And most shocking of all... the explosives don't explode...!

But again, file this under "nostalgic curio" and have a look around.

Default Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • E - Use
  • F - Flashlight
  • Tab - Map
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Shift - Crouch
  • Left Mouse Button - Attack
  • Mouse Wheel, Keys 1-7 - Change Weapons

Note: On the off-chance anybody's confused by the tags, this is a Windows game based on a Mega Drive game; it will absolutely not work on a Mega Drive...!!!
